page.title: 05Shopping in Retford
page.content: Our mums usually go shopping{locally} on the market,Thursday and Saturday.Michelle's mum shops at the Co_op and Tim's mum shops at Hillards super-store for{convenience.} {Patterns}of shopping vary,some mums prefer Tuesday and Friday while others prefer Monday,Thursday and Saturday.Saturday is the most popular day for local shopping. Worksop is the next most{convenient} place for shopping (c.8miles),Doncaster is used for special shopping trips which last a day. The average sum spent on food and clothes is 50.00 a week.The{range} of shops is satisfactory for most needs.A{wider range}of goods is to be had by travelling to the{towns and {cities}of;Worksop,Gainsborough, Sheffield,Doncaster and Nottingham.
